participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.background: My biggest challenge was overcoming my eating disorder. I would like to be reincarnated as a dog so I can continue to be with my family. I enjoy taking walks. My weight is perfect for my body type and lifestyle. Music is a way for me to express myself.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.background: I eat my feelings. I'm often disappointed in myself, but I try to stay positive and do my best. I like spreading laughter and love everywhere I go. I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends. Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing good, too! Thank you for asking!
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to write stories and fairytales. I also enjoy spreading laughter and love everywhere I go.
That's really cool! I love to write music and sing. I also like to take walks and spend time with my family.
Those are all great hobbies! I love music, too. I like to listen to all different kinds of music.
Me too! I like to listen to music from all over the world.
That's awesome! I'm glad to meet someone who shares my love of music.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who has similar interests.
Yes, it is!
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a writer. I write fairytales and stories. I also do some freelance writing for a few different magazines and newspapers.
That sounds like a really fun job! I've always wanted to be a writer.
It is! It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thank you! I do! I'm very lucky to be able to do what I love for a living.
I agree! So, what's your favorite type of music?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably country music.
Oh, cool! I like country music, too. I'm more of a rock fan, but I can appreciate good country music.
That's great! I'm glad to meet someone else who likes country music.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
Yes, it is!
So, what are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm just going to keep writing and see where it takes me.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm sure you'll go far with your writing.
Thank you! I appreciate that.
No problem!
